        Description copied from interface: InventoryGUI

      • addLabel

        public void addLabel(String label,
            int slot,
            ItemStack texture,
            String... lore)
        Description copied from interface: InventoryGUI
        Add an informational label to this GUI.

        If a null texture is passed, a default texture defined in the SensibleToolbox plugin configuration ("gui.texture.label") is used.

        Specified by:
        addLabel in interface InventoryGUI
        Parameters:
        label - the label text
        slot - the inventory slot to place the label in
        texture - the texture for the label, may be null
        lore - the label tooltip; extended information can be defined here

      • addMonitor

        public int addMonitor(MonitorGadget gadget)
        Description copied from interface: InventoryGUI
        Add a monitor gadget to this GUI. The gadget defines its own position in the GUI.
        Specified by:
        addMonitor in interface InventoryGUI
        Parameters:
        gadget - the gadget to add
        Returns:
        a unique integer identifying the monitor gadget

      • getItem

        public ItemStack getItem(int slot)
        Description copied from interface: InventoryGUI
        Get the item in the given inventory slot. The slot must have previously been marked as an item slot with InventoryGUI.setSlotType(int, me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui.InventoryGUI.SlotType)
        Specified by:
        getItem in interface InventoryGUI
        Parameters:
        slot - the slot to check
        Returns:
        the item in that slot, may be null

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • freezeSlots

        public String freezeSlots(int... slots)
        Description copied from interface: InventoryGUI
        Freeze any items in the given slots into a string representation. This can later be passed to InventoryGUI.thawSlots(String, int...).
        Specified by:
        freezeSlots in interface InventoryGUI
        Parameters:
        slots - an array of slots to freeze
        Returns:
        a string representation of the items in the given slots

      • thawSlots

        public void thawSlots(String frozen,
             int... slots)
        Description copied from interface: InventoryGUI
        Thaw a frozen item representation into the given slots. This frozen representation would have been created by InventoryGUI.freezeSlots(int...)
        Specified by:
        thawSlots in interface InventoryGUI
        Parameters:
        frozen - a frozen string representing some items
        slots - the slots to thaw those items into
